ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Mistmoor Drum Goes Poof
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks for the support guys... FYI, if you check the Cazic-thule corner you see that the guilds there limit Dragon runs to those 46 or higher. I dropped all of
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for the support guys... FYI, if you check the Cazic-thule corner
you see that the guilds there limit Dragon runs to those 46 or higher. I
dropped all of the 15oo Plat I had in my pockets and am camping there.
If they dont let me in, maybe I can get a hand me down MM... sigh. If
nothing happens over the weekend I will head to Kedge Keep and look for
a certain Mermaid :)

Back to lurking, I am with you guys everyday :) ..just tongue tied in
the glory of your wisdom :)
Back to NONSTOP Chicago Blues !!! as Moonflower strips more paint off
Garbage Trucks on the High Notes !
